newsitem.title: USA: MGIC Investment Q1 net up 24 pct, revs jump.
newsitem.headline: MGIC Investment Q1 net up 24 pct, revs jump.

text.p: MGIC Investment Corp said on Thursday a sharp increase in its revenues helped earnings rise by 24 percent in the first quarter ended March 31.
The company, which provides private mortgage insurance, said net income reached $72.4 million, or $1.21 a share, versus $58.5 million, or $0.98 a share, a year ago.
Revenues rose to $205.1 million from $174.6 million in the same period in 1996, MGIC said.
MGIC also said new business volume continues to be strong and credit quality is good.
The company's shares were up 3/8 Thursday at 74-1/8.
